design_rules.name: Naming Convention
design_rules.description: All tables and columns must use snake_case naming

design_rules.name: Non-Nullable Foreign Keys
design_rules.description: Foreign key columns should be NOT NULL to ensure referential integrity

design_rules.name: Index Foreign Keys
design_rules.description: All foreign key columns should have indexes for performance

design_rules.name: Primary Key Required
design_rules.description: Every table must have a primary key defined

design_rules.name: Timestamp Tracking
design_rules.description: Tables should have created_at and updated_at columns for audit

design_rules.name: UUID Primary Keys
design_rules.description: Use UUID for primary keys instead of sequential integers

design_rules.name: Soft Delete Pattern
design_rules.description: Important tables should have deleted_at column for soft deletes
